member.name: T:Tethys.Logging.Controls.DebugLogForm
member.summary: DebugLogForm implements a form that contains a RtfLogView to display log4net logging events. This form can be easily added to an application to show logging only if it is explicitly needed.

member.name: M:Tethys.Logging.Controls.DebugLogForm.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Tethys.Logging.Controls.DebugLogForm.DebugLogFormFormClosing(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs)
member.summary: This function is called when the user has clicked on the close window control box. We do not want the window to be closed - we only want it to be hidden. So we disallow closing the window and hide it by ourselves. The parent of the debug trace window is informed by the Hiding event.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: F:Tethys.Logging.Controls.DebugLogForm.components
member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: M:Tethys.Logging.Controls.DebugLogForm.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.summary: Hiding event.

member.summary: Gets the underlying RtfLogView control
